summary: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.
cast: Sylvester Stallone|Michael Caine|Pelé|Bobby Moore|Osvaldo Ardiles|Paul Van Himst|Kazimierz Deyna|Hallvar Thoresen|Mike Summerbee|Co Prins|Russell Osman|John Wark|Søren Lindsted|Kevin O'Callaghan|Max von Sydow|Gary Waldhorn|George Mikell|Laurie Sivell|Arthur Brauss|Robin Turner|Michael Wolf|Jürgen Andersen|David Shawyer|Werner Roth|Amidou|Benoît Ferreux|Jean-François Stévenin|Jack Lenoir|Zoltán Gera|Carole Laure|Tim Pigott-Smith|Julian Curry|Clive Merrison|Maurice Roëves|Michael Cochrane|Jack Kendrick|Daniel Massey|Anton Diffring|Gunter Wolbert|Eolo Capacci|Michel Dhrey|Sándor Egervári|Ferenc Fülöp|Laszlo Klima|Ákos Moskovits|László Tátrai|Nautic Von Horn
keywords: escape|prisoner of war|sports team|world war two|prison
title: Evasión o victoria
